title: Research-Based Educational Design to Enhance Doctoral-Level Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theories and research methodologies, elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: Targeting current elementary mathematics teachers, with a focus on strengthening instructional design capabilities reflecting cognitive science and educational psychology research.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively structure mathematics curriculum content by applying educational psychology theories.
Learners can design instructional materials considering cognitive load theory to improve learner comprehension by over 20%.
Learners can design and implement project-based assessments in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
